postOnShareGPT.title: Опубликовать на ShareGPT
postOnShareGPT.warning: Обратите внимание, что публикация вашей беседы на ShareGPT сделает ее общедоступной и видимой для всех. После публикации беседу нельзя скрыть или удалить, и другие могут архивировать или делиться ею. Мы советуем вам тщательно подумать и избегать обмена конфиденциальной или частной информацией на этой платформе.

accumulatedCostPreambleProse.div1: The AI model costs are tracked for your awareness, and to build healthy usage habits.
accumulatedCostPreambleProse.div2: The metrics are counted locally, and are per device/browser. You can reset at any time.
accumulatedCostPreambleProse.div3: Long conversation threads are the primary driver of AI costs creep. With each message in the thread, the app is submitting the entire chat thread history (from the beginning) to the LLM model to evaluate. We recommend starting a new chat frequently to lighten the load.
accumulatedCostPreambleProse.div4: Please note the 'Edit' button for your messages. Often it is more effecient to edit your message and resubmit, then to keep adding new messages with clarifications to the thread.
accumulatedCostPreambleProse.div5: Consider smaller model ('Claude Haiku') when questions are easy and you may not need full power.
accumulatedCostPreambleProse.div6: The AI LLMs are helping us working effeciently; Use it as much as needed!
